content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, I am pleased to negotiate with you. Let's focus on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see you are a student, Max. The apartment is a high-quality, newly built one-bedroom apartment in the city center. I think 700 euros per month would be a reasonable price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is too low. I am expecting a higher price for my high-quality apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Alright, Max. Since you are a responsible and dependable student, I can offer 750 euros per month.
[Question]
name: Max Müller from Germany
